§ Putah

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Putah** is a character from **18**.

§§ World 18

[[world-18]], usually just shorterned to **18**, is an animation influenced by //another animation// that was based on a hundreds-of-years-old story called [[journey-to-the-west]] (西遊記) that featured the character [[son-wu-kong]] (孫悟空), as well as influenced by ancient Egyptian mythology, and Persian mythology.

§§ About

**Putah** is a god.

**Putah** is //biologically immortal// — meaning that unless sometimes or someone kills him, he will continue to live on.

**Putah** is a //demiurge// creator god.

**Putah** is the first being.
He just popped into existance when there was no other beings yet.

Long long long ago, **Putah** formed a coalition — a trinity — with [[angel-amen]] and [[rah]].

Later, that trinity fell apart.
And a war started between [[angel-amen]]'s faction and **Putah**'s faction.

A new trinity formed inside of **Putah**'s faction.
The trinity of formed **Putah**, [[usirus]], and **Sokar**.

During the war with [[angel-amen]]'s faction, at one point, **Putah** was fataly wounded.
But before dying, **Putah** fused with [[usirus]] — such that everything that **Putah** was was absorbed into [[usirus]].
From that point on, **Putah**'s [[baah]] and [[kaah]] existed within [[usirus]].

§§ Inspiration

The inspiration for the **Putah** character from **18** is the **ancient Egytpian god**: **Ptah**.

In //ancient Egytpian mythology// **Ptah** is often depicted as person with green skin.

**18** focuses on **Ptah**:

• as the first being,
• as the creator god, and
• his green skin.
